column4: im getting this error when trying to open firefox or galeon:  I could not load the bookmarks file, will load the default bookmarks from /usr/share/galeon/default-bookmarks.xbel.
INTERNAL ERROR on Browser End: Could not get the plugin manager
System error?:: Success
sorry for the flood
can anyone help?
I get INTERNAL ERROR with both firefox and galeon
so now im pretty much stuck with lynx as a web browser for now
u been messing with java?
yeah i was in the wiki following how to install it
http://forum.java.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=570700&start=0
id love to read that if I could open it
thats the root of the prob
now that really bites..lets see if i can translate for ya real quick
try http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/5321
pasted it there to prevent flooding
in that ln -s command, where should the space be? /YOUR JAVA_________________________________________________ DIRECTORY/jre1.5.0_05/plugin/i386/ns7/libjavaplugin_oji.so__
thats just one long dir
